title: Recreio (The)
body:
This newspaper published 25 issues, from May 1, 1863, to July 13, 1864, and was edited by the students of our lyceum.

43 issues of a newspaper with the same title were published from September 19, 1897, to July 10, 1898.

1863: Start of the publication of the newspaper 'Recreio' edited by the lyceum students
1864: End of the publication of the newspaper 'Recreio' edited by the lyceum students
1897: Start of the publication of a newspaper with the same title 'Recreio'
1898: End of the publication of a newspaper with the same title 'Recreio'
